item.name: 7 Wonders
item.comment:
This is a fun enough game and I can totally see why this is a great game for so many people, I'm just not one of those people. I like the drafting and the puzzle of finding the right combos, but I often feel as though I am setting up for a game that never comes.
I love the theme but it doesn't shine through for me. It seems to just fade into the background.

item.name: Abalone
item.comment: I really dig this. I would like to get my hands on a copy to see how it holds up over many more plays.

item.name: Among the Stars
item.comment: This is real good. I love the theme and the art and hope that the future expansions keep opening up the gameplay to give more and more options.

item.name: Battleball
item.comment: The football die is really cool.

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
item.comment: The theme is super fun to immerse yourself in and that makes up for the simple game play and sometimes unbalanced games.

item.name: Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game
Cards Against Humanity: The Bigger, Blacker Box
Chupacabra: Survive the Night
item.comment: What a disappointment.

item.name: Crokinole
item.comment: I found my board at an estate sale for ten bucks. I really like it and am considering upgrading to a nicer board one of these days.

item.name: Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
Dune Express
item.comment: Good as a three player game, too much push and pull to play it two or four player. Looking for a little more meat then this offers.

item.name: Elder Sign
item.comment: I like the App better but still fun to pull out every now and again.

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
item.comment: A lot of fun.

item.name: FlowerFall
item.comment: Very fun and silly. Even more fun when dropping the cards off balconies.

item.name: Formula D: Circuits 4 – Grand Prix of Baltimore & Buddh
Fracture
item.comment: Only played the prototype but we found a massive flaw in gameplay to completely destroy everything another player works on. It can be won by the person who just waits the longest to build up so that all the fracture cards are discarded.

item.name: Fresh Trax
item.comment: No

item.name: Hanabi
item.comment: Still looking to master this one. Top score is a 23. Very difficult to not accidently give unfair clues, a real brainteaser.

item.name: Isaac Asimov's Robots VCR Mystery Game
Legendary Encounters: A Predator Deck Building Game
Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game
Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men
Merchant of Venus (second edition)
item.comment: There is some real joy to flying back and forth across the galaxy picking up and dropping off random things and upgrading your ship and components.

item.name: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
item.comment: Very fun, our group went through a phase of playing this like crazy. I don't play as much anymore but still occasionally and a great one to play with kids and casual gamers.

item.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Rise of the Runelords – Base Set
The Resistance
item.comment: Awesome.

item.name: The Resistance: Avalon
item.comment: The extra roles are cool and I like the idea of the theme but it doesn't work at all for me. The idea of being hid amongst everyone else doesn't work when you are a hideous monster like it does when you are a spy amongst folk. The art is not to my taste at all, but it is Resistance.

item.name: Rex: Final Days of an Empire
item.comment: Damn you Herbert estate.

item.name: Risk Legacy
item.comment: The legacy elements are awesome....but it is still Risk.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Roma
item.comment: There are a few cards in here that when in play pretty much guarantee victory. That really took the fun out of it.

item.name: Skull
item.comment: Very cool art. An ok way to kill time.

item.name: Small World: Grand Dames of Small World
Snake Oil
item.comment: Fun but lost it's appeal after awhile like many similar games.

item.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation – Interactive VCR Board Game – A Klingon Challenge
Two Rooms and a Boom
item.comment: This was so exciting at first but as time went on I found that it started ending the same way 95% of the time. I would play again but not in any rush.

item.name: VivaJava: The Coffee Game: The Dice Game
We Didn't Playtest This: Legacies
item.comment: Fun gimmick.
